alt shift X|say testing
control DELETE|say test2
alt control H|cast haste&~look
control shift K|say test5
alt control shift K|say test6

alt F6|say test9
alt SPACE|say test10
ADD|say plus test
control DOWN|COMMANDCLEAR
control UP|COMMANDFOCUS
